name: Planet Conquest (Beth Sun)
description:
Story

The setting of this game project is a lonely astronaut arriving on a small planet that completes a day/night switch every ten seconds due to the planet's fast rotation. During the day there will be meteorites falling and at night there will be mummies hunting down all living things.

Mechanics

Use WASD to move, LEFT SHIFT to sprint, and SPACE to jump.

The player's mission is to collect all the samples before the spacesuit breaks and return to the pod.

During the day the player needs to dodge meteorite attacks. Having a shield can stop the meteorite attacks for a few seconds.

At night the player needs to escape mummy attacks.

Stepping on a lava pit will trap the player until the player dies.

A portal can transport the player to another portal location.

The player will not be attacked in th pod area and can repair the broken spacesuit.
